pkgmetadata.longdescription: GLCM Textures of Raster Layers // Calculates grey level co- occurrence matrix (GLCM) based texture measures (Hall-Beyer (2017) https://prism.ucalgary.ca/bitstream/handle/1880/51900/te xture%20tutorial%20v%203_0%20180206.pdf; Haralick et al. (1973) doi:10.1109/TSMC.1973.4309314) of raster layers using a sliding rectangular window. It also includes functions to quantize a raster into grey levels as well as tabulate a glcm and calculate glcm texture metrics for a matrix.
